title: E-Commerce App
description: Built a user-friendly e-commerce platform with React.js for browsing, cart management, and order placement. Designed a robust backend using Spring Boot and MySQL to manage product, cart, and order data. Integrated Auth0 for authentication and implemented features like product listings, user accounts, and secure payment processing.

title: Hotel Service
description: Developed a hotel booking system using Java microservices and Spring Boot for secure and scalable reservations. Implemented rating, hotel, and user services with MySQL and MongoDB for data management. Utilized Config Server, Eureka client, and Resilience4j for fault tolerance, and built a responsive React.js frontend integrated with REST APIs

title: Student Portal
description: Developed a student profile management system using Django and SQLite, enabling efficient student data management. Designed database schemas, implemented backend logic, and created a responsive frontend using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Enhanced data handling capabilities with Pandas for efficient data processing and analysis.
